comment: She is not clear on grading and does not understand that you have other classes. If you work or take more than 12 hours be prepared to not make an A and maybe not  b. Also, if you miss one class automatic 1 point off final grade.

Very tough course. But that is because its chinese we are talking about. She is an amazing teacher! Really loves to teach! I would come to class very drained and discouraged, but she would fill me back up with encouragement and help me keep moving forward. I would love to take from her again! Fun, helpful and you leave with a great education.
